database.name: VIEW SSA_PROJPROP_CONTRACT_LINE_V
database.view: SELECT cl.ssa_projprop_contract_line_id AS ssa_projprop_contract_line_v_id, cl.ad_client_id, cl.ad_org_id, cl.isactive, cl.created, cl.createdby, cl.updated, cl.updatedby, c.ssa_projprop_contract_id, c.c_project_id, c.documentno, c.datedoc, c.docstatus, c.c_bpartner_id, c.salesrep_id, cl.ssa_project_property_id, cl.discount, cl.priceactual, cl.c_currency_id, cl.ssa_projprop_contract_line_id, cl.linestatus FROM ssa_projprop_contract_line cl, ssa_projprop_contract c WHERE cl.ssa_projprop_contract_id = c.ssa_projprop_contract_id AND c.docstatus = 'CO'
